# [FEAT] Customer Portal

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `customer-experience`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement a customer self-service portal for ticket management and support access.

## Requirements

### Portal Features
- Customer login/registration
- SSO integration
- Password reset
- Profile management

### Ticket Management
- View own tickets
- Submit new tickets
- Add comments to tickets
- Upload attachments
- View ticket history
- Ticket search and filters

### Self-Service
- Knowledge base access
- Search functionality
- Article recommendations
- Contact support options
- FAQ section

### Portal Customization
- Branding (logo, colors)
- Custom CSS
- Custom pages
- Navigation customization
- Widget placement

### Notifications
- Email notifications
- Portal notifications
- Notification preferences
- Digest options

### Organization Features
- View organization tickets
- Shared ticket access
- Organization admin role

## Zendesk Reference
Customer request portal is where customers submit tickets if they can't find information in the knowledge base and where they manage their tickets.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Customer authentication works
- [ ] Ticket management functional
- [ ] Knowledge base accessible
- [ ] Portal customizable
- [ ] Notifications working
